tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Went to Dr.Bajaju2019s clinic after reading reviews online for my root canal in June.
Lets start with clinic
1)      It is well managed with lot of staff
2)      You get appointment reminders on the phone and your also kept informed by call in case of any changes to your appointment
3)      Clinic is clean and well kept
4)      Material used on good quality
 
Treatment experience
1)      Dr. Bajaj is very polite and pleasant, explained me what was the process on the treatment and the cost.
2)      So after doing the RC on my one affected tooth which I was suffering from last 4 months as I was aboard travelling and could not afford to carry out treatment aboard was great pain relief.
3)      On the same day he ask me to carry out full scan on all my teethu2019s to see any problem with other teethu2019s
4)      Scan result showed one new RC and one failed old RC to be redone and one filling.
 
 
So one more new RC was done after 2 days, As I had only a week in Mumbai before going away treatment was planned for August on all the teeth when I was back in Mumbai for 3 weeks.
 
So back in August on the first day one more RC was done, on the same day I ask to get the other small filling to be done. But Dr did not have time becoz of his other booking, some how the small filling was pushed to last 4 days of me in Mumbai.
 
On the day on small filing Dr. Bajaj removed the old filling and put temporary filling and ask me come back after 2 days for final filling, on the final filling day which was my second last day in Mumbai he inspected the tooth and asked his assistant to complete the filling.
 
And now the trouble started, she I think is not trained and did not knew what she was doing and could not remove the temporary filling and two times she did something that caused lot of pain to me.  At the end Dr. bajaj had to come back to finish the teeth, but damage was done.
 
The tooth had started paining after treatment which was not happening before, I went to the clinic next day as I was flying aboard the day after, the assistant and all the helper where relaxing in the clinic and atmosphere was not at all professional as Dr. Bajaj was not in the clinic, she said let me take the Xray and then said Oh! this is root canal, so I am thinking why did you not take this Xray yesterday and check what you have done.  utterly unprofessional. Till date the tooth is hurting me and I cannot get the treatment done as I am aboard for next 5 months.
 
Now I am back to square one where I was in July, this is after spending 25000 rupees and 7 visits.
 
Cons: 1) donu2019t get any treatment done by the assistantu2019s.
2) Slow treatment plan
3) very expensive
     
Pros: Dr. Bajaj is very good in what he is doing
2) material used are of good quality
 

I should be entitle for some refund for messing up the tooth.

Dear readers, below are my true experience. Not a single element of exaggeration is added to it.
I am  student of SPJIMR. After joining the course I developed a sporadic pain in tooth. I did not pay much attention to it. During a short vacation I went back to my home in Kolkata and gave a send thought to it and visited a dentist. He advised me to go for root canal. He said it will take 2 appointments but a duration of 1 week in between. Then I searched in internet for a dentist in around West Andheri. Practo topped the search mainly because it was the most searched or visited portal in this space. However, I went through couple of reviews and got convinced that this was exactly the dental clinic that I was looking for. Mostly it was because of the reviews about Dr. Ajay Bajaj. His vast  experience in this domain,various patient's experience (through reviews in the site) in undergoing painless RC treatment and other major treatments in dental space carried by him made me believe that I should take the appointment right away. My main intention was not only to have a painless experience while undergoing RC but to have a effective solution to my problems. I booked my dates and visited the clinic. I was warmly greeted by Dr. Ajaj Bajaj. Dr. Nishi Bajaj initially inspected my tooth and they both consulted and told me to got for RC. I explained my constraints (as I was suppose to travel within 2 weeks to US for a exchange program), so they to start RC proceedings immediately that evening itself. I did not expect the proceedings to happen so fast. Dr. Ajay did the RC flawlessly and truly speaking never had pain during or after the RC. Post RC, I went through couple of filling in other tooth as well. I felt both of the doctors were very experienced in their profession. They took utmost care in whatever big or small treatments they did and with perfection. Surprising to see their consulting charges was so nominal. But there were no dearth of quality services.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had visited Dr. Ajay Bajaj for a root canal treatment. My treatment with other dentist was going on for almost 2 years during which I underwent extreme pain. I was referred to him when no dentists could handle my case. I had undergone a root canal but the tooth ache wouldn't subside. Dr. Bajaj evaluated my case patiently and tried to figure the issue. After several x-rays he found the root cause of my misery. My wisdom tooth was the problem, it required root canal with decay on three places. 
Dr. Bajaj conducted a root canal in single sitting. It was a twisted surgery, not an easy one to handle, gladly it was successful and me had my bridge too. Before I met Dr. Bajaj I was mentally drained about my dental issue. Today after his treatment I got my Smile back. Thanks to Smilez Unlimited, they truly live up to their name. 
I would thoroughly recommend Dr. Bajaj to everyone with dental issues. He is highly professional, meticulous, well informed, well experienced and phenomenal at his work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Since I have got root canal done I can only talk about that. Dr. Bajaj is amazing at his work and will highly recommend him. If you need a good job done, there is no second choice.  I am sure others may be good too but I can vouch here with experience. 

My daughter is a practising dentist in Vadodara and in Mumbai she insisted to visit him only.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
At the age of 72 I have been undergoing dental implant procedures under DR Bajaj..his hands are truely the hands of God when it comes to dental procedure... Without any sense of exaggeration, I wish to place on record that I have found Dr. Bajaj is the best in the country and is highly professional providing expert and top of the industry treatment . He is also highly respected by the entire dental community.
Under his guidance, the other doctors Dr Poonam and staff all very compassionate and well trained by him also render excellent service explaining to patients the various procedures being carried out from time to time and above all they are extremely courteous. I wish Dr. Bajaj and his clinic all the best in the days to come. I am very happy and lucky to be treated at this age so well . 
Mrs. Geetha Balakrishnan.

My Dental experience with Dr. Ajay Bajaj has been extremely satisfactory. 
Dr. Bajaj saved me from an extraction which most doctors were sure had to be done. There was a broken file within my tooth with two canals. Dr. very carefully bypassed the canals and cleaned up my tooth till the end and completed the re-root canal very smoothly. I owe this tooth to him.
Dr. Bajaj has a very fine and experienced hand and can handle complicated cases very confidently. He has a lovely team who took very good care of me each time I visited his clinic.

I shall recommend Dr. Bajaj to everyone ** ** ** *** ** *** ****** ******** * **** **** ****** ** * **** *****

Deepa Kishnani
+65 96688530
reply_text: Thank you Deepa for your lovely words and confidence in us!

reply_text: Thank you Deepa for your lovely words and confidence in us!

review:
I am not from Mumbai so after a lot of research I went to Dr. Ajay. I was having a sensitive molar tooth. He did a thorough check and advised me to go forna root canal. Next he asked me to do a full mouth X-ray as he could see some more cavities in other teeth as well. Finally we had to do 2 root canal and 9 permanent fillings. So basically all my molars had to be treated. He explained me the procedure very well and also took a special care as I was an outstation patient and had to leave soon. Finally my all RCT and filings were done. I won't say that it didn't pain in RCT. It did pain. But it was very very very small pain. Kind of momentary pains. 
The staff is also very friendly and helpful. So if u r a dentist phobic pay him a visit. The fear might just go away!

First of all I am thankful to Dr.Ajay Bajaj for giving genuine advise to me regarding my dental problem.He is a very gentle person and ofcourse an expert dentist.He gave proper time to me for understanding my dental related desires as he is a very good listner too and did my diastema closure very beautifully.One can see this nice Doctor for the right and genuine opinion regarding any sort of dental problems and will definately get the best suitable option for the treatment and its excellent result.My best wishes to him and to his team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Absolutely understanding, very friendly, always very patient with difficult patients spends his valuable time to keep patient's doubts and minds at rest and very caring during procedures. 
Very upto date regarding his work and knowledge and practically so excellent in his work we have never experienced any post treatment problems. 
Appointments and every thing very well managed. 
Well trained staff so important for Doctor to work efficiently and send patients home with smiles unlimited. Hats off..
reply_text: Thank you Freny aunty! We have been treating both of you since almost 20 years now! Even at the age of around 80 years, you both are lovely cooperative patients! 🙏🙏

The procedure was later handed over to his fellow inspite of it being a complicated one. She caused a great pain due to repeated filing and x-ray ** *** *** *** **** ** ***** ** ********** ** **** **** *** ********* *** **** * **** **** Though x-ray showed files were beyond roots in first x-ray . On being questioned , she got irked. All this happened despite my son and daughter being interventional cardiologist and doctors who accompanied me. * ***** *** ***** ****** *** ***** **** ****** ** ***** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Ajay is very talented *** ******* doctor. I had taken my wife for her wisdom tooth extraction and other problems. He did thorough check-up and provided detailed treatment plan. He readily agreed to perform wisdom tooth extraction since we had travelled from Pune. He was highly considerate about our travel. The whole extraction process was done ****** *********** He was constantly talking to the patient explaining the process and making her comfortable. Post process, he gave detailed instructions and medicines. I am very happy with his ****** *** treatment. I highly recommend Dr. Ajay to everyone for any possible dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Bajaj is always confident about his work  and gentle with his patients. He keeps his patients calm with his demeanour.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Ajay Bajaj is undoubtedly an expert Consulting Endodontist. Presently I am undergoing a RCT from him. Apart from his professional expertise, I found him friendly and courteous. He cleared all my doubts about the treatment I am undergoing and made me feel comfortable.

Very grateful to have been referred to Dr. Ajay & Dr Nishi Bajaj. I went with a very aggravated, painful, shaky almost gone molar which was candidate for immediate extraction - however not only did Dr Ajay Bajaj save the tooth; true to the clinic's name I was actually smiling throughout the procedure! You can say bye bye to your pain the moment you step into their clinic. 
My husband has a rather weak dental constitution - he is 43 however his dental age can be described as that of a 70 year old. His gums were so weak that we had given up all hopes of saving his teeth - until we started treatment here. He has got a new lease of life - thanks to Dr Nishi Bajaj's advanced gum treatment which was also painless clean and non-invasive at best. With our dental care here we are both happy and SMILING :) Thank you ever so much Dr Nishi & Dr Ajay!  
Regards 
Archana & Pratip Banerjee

My husband and I have been seeing doc. Ajay since 1997. We live in Powai and he used to be a visiting doc. Due to reasons I don't no he stopped coming but instead we started visiting him where ever he went!!! That's for only one reason. He is humble and a good human being AND ABOVE ALL a brilliant doc. Specialist in his root canal treatment and who can do a drill on a wisdom tooth without one having to take anesthisia........and u wldnt realise when he finished!!!!
We travel from Powai to Juhu inspire of the hundreds of dentists that have come to Powai since 1997!!!!
Do I need say more!!!

Dr. Ajay Bajaj is an excellent dentist. Before doing anything he does a through examination and then decides the best course of action. He patiently explains the problem and the possible root causes to the patient as well. The helping staff at his clinic is also very helpful and they pay attention to the hygiene at the clinic. Along with him, Dr. Nishi and Dr. Mansi are also very good dentist. All of them work together as a team, for instance - Dr. Ajay would do the root canal and then Dr. Nishi would do the filling and crown measurement, throughout the process Dr. Ajay is present and they discuss the issue, if needed.  In short, a very helpful and proficient dentist. I would wholeheartedly recommend him to anyone facing any sort of dental problem.

Like a lot of you (possibly, most of you) , I was under the impression that a root canal is a long and painful procedure, spanning several days. This was my first experience with Dr. Ajay Bajaj and he proved that I was completely wrong. Dr. Ajay performed TWO root canals in one day over a couple of hours. And,even better, it was completely painless! Dr. Ajay's expertise and vast experience were evident in how he skillfully and effortlessly completed the procedures. Furthermore he and his team answered all the questions that I had about the procedure, making sure that I was comfortable and relaxed! 

Overall, it was a fantastic experience and I highly recommend Dr Ajay Bajaj!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Bajaj and his team are highly skilled in their work as well as friendly and kind. I no longer fear dental check ups and procedures as they make you comfortable and give personal attention and care. All our family members, including my kids, visit the clinic regularly.

Dr Ajay Bajaj and his team get my highest recommendations for this procedure.

Dr Bajaj was extremely friendly and caught the root cause of the problem very soon. He went out of his way to treat at an odd hour also. 
His penchant for technology is an added advantage and use of the same for patient treatment makes it an excellent combination.
100% recommended for any dental procedure.

The staff and the Dr Ajay made me feel like home and treated me like a family . 
This was my first visit to.his clinic from overseas .
They were very accommodating and fitted me in a very short notice .
Great clinic , great staff and the Doctor himself is very simple and advises very well .
I would highly recomend this place

Dr. Ajay Bajaj is everything you can be as a great dentist. Mastery in his craft, very professional and pleasant personality, never rushed and listens to patients, great diagnosis. He is also a great manager and it shows in his teams and clinics efficiency and patient focus. I would not need the go to another dentist in india or abroad.

I had gone in for a root canal, implant and a cap, I was expecting pain and had postponed my visit couple of times to another dentist. Dr Ajay Bajaj ensured that I was informed about the treatment plan and there was no pain during the treatment! Visit timings were adhered to and I never had to wait for more than 10-15 mins for any of my appointments, a refreshing and painless change from other dentists I have been to earlier.

I am saying this based on one of my experience when this affected my jaw movment for 5 days with pain when I was treated some years ago by an assistant of Dr Bajaj for teh anestesia. He really treated my dental condition very well. It is due to his expertise that I have been cured. Thank you doctor.

review: Dr.Ajay is very  good for root canal I had relief from pain strongly recommend him for dental treatment

I went in with two broken teeth and had to have a root canal done too. The level of professionalism at this clinic is commendable. I came back with teeth fillings that looked and felt better. Thank you, for giving me my smile back and for taking such good care of me. Greatly appreciated. I would recommend this place to everybody.

***** **** ***** ********* ******* doctor he is an Excellent human being which makes me comfortable during annual visit to his clinic.

He has impressive IT system for his operation I.e tracking right from appointments, 6 monthly reminders for follow up, history of the patients I.e nature of work done and expenses billed.

He has very good  team in the form of highly competent doctors/dentist and support staff who strive hard to make your experience memorable one.

Overall

Dr Ajay Bajaj is an extremely professional person and takes utmost efforts to ensure the treatment provided to me and my family was of the highest standards. He is very patient and takes his time to communicate the issues and the relevant treatment that should be given and most importantly at an economical price.

I organised my appointment with Dr. Bajaj from Australia and he went out of his way to accommodate myself and my limited time frame and availability. He was very thorough with explaining the procedures, answering my questions and performing the operations. Not only was he a great dentist but a genuinely nice guy and I hope that we stay in contact. Do yourself a favour and see Dr. Bajaj for any of your dentistry needs.

Hi myself Dr nikhat m a dentist and me and my family's dentist is Dr Bajaj. He an excellent doctor and very humble person giving excellent and painless treatment. We trust him completely.... Literally blindly. Words will not be enough.Thank you soo much doctor.

review: Friendly,approachable&Professional.Pleasant experience,prompt treatment .Clinic was clean,tidy and presentable.

I have been getting my dental treatments done since last six years or more from  Dr Ajay Bajaj.  For medical treatment one can not say that it is an awesome experience as ultimately it takes a toll on one's health but all I could say is that both, Dr Ajay and Dr Nishi Bajaj,  are wonderful dentists. I was and still am a nervous patient hence before meeting Dr Ajay Bajaj, I used to avoid dental treatments but that is not the case now.  The Staff is good, dentists are extremely co-operative and thorough professionals.  The experience of getting dental treatments done at Smilez Clinic has always been great.  
Today's patients are qualified  and they expect the doctors to explain their problems to them before planning the line of treatment.  Doctors at Smilez Clinic not only discuss the problems with patients but they also live up to patients' expectations. Thanks to all of you for all the help.  Thanks to my cousin, Dr Ajit Gandhi,  for introducing me to Dr Ajay Bajaj.

Dr Ajay Bajaj is an extremely professional and committed individual. Despite his busy schedule and activities, he ensures that every query raised by the patient is addressed and takes the time to explain the extent of the problem and the most relevant and economical treatment required. His advice on treatment encompasses not only the short term benefits but the long term advantages that the patient stands to gain over a period of time. I am very pleased with the treatment I have received at Smilez Unlimited and would recommend other members of my family. I strongly encourage the younger doctors who have graduated from the universities to adapt similar professional approach as Dr Bajaj and continue to serve the society with the same enthusiasm.

I needed a root canal urgently in Mumbai as my symptoms of irreversible pulpitis had worsened during the flight . Dr. Bajaj was very kind to scheduled an appointment and initiate treatment immediately to relieve me of  irreversible pulpitis pain

It was a pain less and smooth experience. Dr. Bajaj is very well versed with his techniques and equipments and I would highly recommend him as an endodontist.
